title.native: キラキラ☆プリキュアアラモード

description:
Ichika Usami is a second-year middle school student who loves sweets, but struggles to bake. One day, she encounters a fairy named Pekorin, who is able to detect "Kirakiraru", an element residing in sweets. However, an evil fairy starts to steal the Kirakiraru for themselves, leaving the sweets black and lifeless. Determined to protect the sweets, Ichika gains the power of the Legendary Patisserie and transforms into the Pretty Cure, Cure Whip, to protect the Kirakiraru.

(Source: Wikipedia, edited)
synonyms: Kirakira Pretty Cure a la Mode
KIRA KIRA☆PRETTY CURE A LA MODE

tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東堂いづみ) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izumi_Todo)

Izumi Toudou is a collective pseudonym for [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s staff.

__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)

[Website](http://www.teichiku.co.jp/artist/komagata-yuri/) | [Profile (Space Craft Group)](http://spacecraft.co.jp/komagata_yuri/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/komagatayuri)

One of the finalists of 5th Anisong Grand Prix alongside Konomi Suzuki. Filipino-Japanese.
Mizuno Sayaka is a music selector working for Swara Production
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanabushi_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanabushi_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVditot9A8REGHSYzvguYow)

Director, animator and indie game creator affiliated with [studio ALBLE](https://anilist.co/studio/7520/studio-ALBLE).

Founded studio ALBLE alongside [Komugiko2000](https://anilist.co/staff/170300/Komugiko2000) and [Mizuki Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/299543) on May 24, 2024.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanabushi_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanabushi_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVditot9A8REGHSYzvguYow)

Director, animator and indie game creator affiliated with [studio ALBLE](https://anilist.co/studio/7520/studio-ALBLE).

Founded studio ALBLE alongside [Komugiko2000](https://anilist.co/staff/170300/Komugiko2000) and [Mizuki Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/299543) on May 24, 2024.
